summary: Comprehensive testing of Smart Livestock Care (SLC) - Vet Batch A: Preventive & Breeding Services (Vaccination Register, Deworming Register, AI Register, Calf Birth Register) completed. All backend APIs (26 tests) passed with 100% success rate. Frontend UI testing verified all four registers with proper data-testid attributes, stats cards, form dialogs, and filter functionality.

seed_data_creation: Test records created during backend testing with TEST- prefix tags for all four registers (vaccination, deworming, AI, calf birth).
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Vet Batch A features (Preventive & Breeding Services) are working correctly. Backend APIs tested with pytest (26 tests). Frontend UI tested with Playwright for Vaccination Register, Deworming Register, AI Register, and Calf Birth Register. All case number formats follow the pattern PREFIX-YYYY-XXXXX. EPG testing checkbox in Deworming works correctly. AI Register has 5 tabs for comprehensive data entry. PD result update functionality is working.

vaccination_register.list_view: Shows records with VAC-L/VAC-S-YYYY-XXXXX format, vaccine name, species, animals vaccinated
vaccination_register.stats_cards: Total Records, Animals Vaccinated, Large Animals, Small Animals, This Month
vaccination_register.new_record_dialog: Tabs for Large/Small Animals, Tag/ID, Farmer Name, Village, Phone, Species, Breed, Age, Vaccine Name, Batch Number, Manufacturer, Dose Rate, Dose Given, Route, Vaccination Date, Next Due Date, Animals Vaccinated, Flock Size (for small), Remarks
vaccination_register.filters: Search by case number/tag/farmer, Animal Type filter, Species filter

deworming_register.list_view: Shows records with DEW-YYYY-XXXXX format, drug used, dose, species, EPG Tested badge
deworming_register.stats_cards: Total Records, Completed, This Month, Fecal Tested
deworming_register.new_record_dialog: Tag/ID, Farmer Name, Village, Phone, Species, Breed, Age, Body Weight, Drug Used, Drug Batch, Dose Rate, Dose Given, Route, Deworming Date, Next Due Date (auto-calculated 3 months), Result, Fecal Sample Collected checkbox, EPG Before/After, Remarks
deworming_register.filters: Search by case number/tag/farmer, Species filter, Drug filter

ai_register.list_view: Shows records with AI-YYYY-XXXXX format, species, tag, bull, village, PD status badge (Pregnant/PD Pending)
ai_register.stats_cards: Total AI Records, Confirmed Pregnant, Not Pregnant, PD Pending
ai_register.new_record_dialog: 5 tabs - Basic Info (Village, Mandal, District, State, Farmer Details), Semen Details (SS Number, Bull ID, Bull Breed, Semen Batch, Semen Station), Animal Details (Tag, Sire, Species, Breed, Age, Parity, BCS, Milk Yield, Heat Symptoms, AI Details), Stock & Fee (Opening Balance, Straws Received/Used, Closing Balance, Fee Amount/Receipt), PD & Calf (PD Date, PD Result, PD Days, Calf Birth Date, Calf Sex)
ai_register.filters: Search by case number/tag/farmer/village, Species filter, PD Result filter
ai_register.edit_functionality: Edit button to update PD result and other fields

calf_birth_register.list_view: Shows records with CALF-YYYY-XXXXX format, dam tag, calf sex, birth type, Twins badge
calf_birth_register.stats_cards: Total Births, Male Calves, Female Calves, Twins, Stillborn
calf_birth_register.new_record_dialog: Farmer Details (Name, Village, Phone, ID), Dam Details (Tag, Species, Breed, Condition), Sire Details (Tag, Breed, AI Case Number, AI Done Date), Birth Details (Expected Date, Actual Date, Birth Type, First Colostrum Time, Twins checkbox, Stillborn checkbox), Calf Details (Sex, Weight, Tag, Color, Condition), Remarks
calf_birth_register.filters: Search by case number/tag/farmer, Species filter, Sex filter
